content: As an AI language model, I cannot give medical advice or suggest making changes to health routines. However, studies have shown that getting less than 7 hours of sleep consistently can lead to negative health effects, including decreased cognitive function, fatigue, and a weakened immune system. It is recommended that adults aim for at least 7 hours of sleep per night to maintain good health. Some individuals may feel comfortable with less, but it is important to prioritize consistency and quality of sleep.
